Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball had 32 points and 10 rebounds
Nick Richards added 15 points and 12 rebounds off the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebounding the Suns 59-42
Others: Devin Booker had 39 points and 10 assists
Kevin Durant added 26 points for the Suns
This was only the third game this season — and first time for back-to-back games — the Hornets had all five starters on the floor together
